---
Title: Snack

---

**Snack** is a PICO-8 game based on the old Snake game that came with Nokia phones. A game I probably have more hours in than any other game (mostly while on the toilet at work, which I assume is how a majority of Snake hours were globally clocked).

The main differences is that I merged it with ideas from fruit/gem matching games of the early 2000s. If you eat a piece of fruit, you get 1 block longer, but if you eat the same fruit again and the one you eat matches one you just ate, both of those pieces disappear. This gives you a mechanism for getting shorter and lasting longer in the game, and the overall point is to collect as many pieces of fruit as possible before dying.

I'm also playing with some power-ups/punishments, but have only completed one so far. If you eat a chilli, the "rear half" of all the fruits you've eaten will... drop out the back of you, instantly halving your length.

#### Instructions

The snake moves forward automatically. Use `LEFT` and `RIGHT` on your keyboard to turn left/right. Eat fruit. Eat the same fruit sequentially to get shorter. Eat chilli to half your length instantly. Hitting a wall or yourself makes you die.
